description: This is a learning skill which provides French translations for English words or sentences. Invoke by saying "ask french tutor to translate <your word or sentence>" or by saying "Ask french tutor what is <your word or sentence>"
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask french tutor what is father in french
Alexa, ask french tutor to translate good morning
Alexa, ask french tutor what is I am going to paris
name: French Tutor
shortDescription: French Tutor translates your English word or sentence into French
